entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle or flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
